typeOfCommit.description: Changes to the build system or external dependencies
Changes related to CI configuration files and scripts
Improve your code to make it more readable and maintainable
Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)
Add missing tests or correcting existing tests

localRules: <scope> is indicates the scope affected by the change. Optional (if not given, do not add)
<subject> is a short summary of the commit. Write it in 50 characters or less and don't include periods
<body> is a longer description of the commit. Optional (if not given, do not add)
<footer> is a place to put additional information about the commit. Optional (if not given, do not add)
if the request doesn't make sense, return 'request error'
